name: Rich Clicker
description:
Rich Clicker - Best Addictive Idle Tapping Game - Offline - FREE
Endless gameplay will allow you to play for an indefinite amount of time. Tap to make money and grow your business into an epic millionaire empire. Level up your business and get rich in this idle auto clicker money maker.

- Tap to get coins
- Upgrade to get autoclick
- Dozen of upgrades
- Offline playing, earn coins while you sleep
- Best Idle Clicker Game for Android
